post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this 1909-1911 T206 Bernhard, Nashville, Southern Leaguer, with an Old Mill back for sale.

Description: No creases. White line in the scan is a light surface scratch from the left border to the player's eye. Small surface scrape just below the player's collar. Corner wear-rounded corners and some surface chipping on the bottom corners. Back is clean except for some light surface wear bottom right. The card will display very well in any ungraded collection.

Price: Not available

Payments accepted: Paypal F/F (Goods and services add 4%), check, or money order.

Note: First post or private message with a commitment to purchase gets the card.

Thanks for looking,
Joe
